item.description:
Those of us who went to India for a Happy Hour(s) liked it so much that we've decided to go back! The food was excellent (many appetizers were $1), the drinks were HUGE (I could do the backstroke in my margarita glass) and don't even get me started on the super fancy restroom...let's just say we're considering holding a RIAS meeting in there sometime!

This Happy Hour(s) is being held on a Tuesday - and it just so happens that Tuesday is the night that India offers all entrees at 1/2 price for those that want to stick around a bit longer.

Check out their website for specifics: http://www.indiaresta...

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Rhode Island Atheist Society - Happy Hour(s) at India!
